description: A comprehensive UI design system for a dark-themed, futuristic web application, specifically for cryptocurrency or fintech platforms. The style is defined by a deep space background, vibrant neon glows (cyan, magenta, yellow), custom container shapes, and a structured, multi-section layout.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Black with a subtle, textured starfield/noise pattern.

accent-glow-primary.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow-primary.description: Vivid cyan for primary borders, navigation elements, and highlights.

accent-glow-secondary.name: vibrant-magenta-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: Bright magenta/purple for active states, glows, and banners.

accent-glow-tertiary.name: bright-yellow-glow
accent-glow-tertiary.description: Bright yellow for specific card borders and list bullets.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for main headings and important text.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: Light grey for subtitles, body copy, and less critical information.

text-accent.name: accent-text-cyan
text-accent.description: Cyan for specific titles within components.

button-primary.name: primary-button-gradient
button-primary.description: A blue-to-purple gradient for primary call-to-action buttons.

button-secondary.name: secondary-button-background
button-secondary.description: A dark teal for secondary action buttons like 'Submit'.

warning.name: warning-red-border
warning.description: Red for borders and text in warning messages.

banner.name: info-banner-blue
banner.description: A solid, bright blue for full-width informational banners.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, preferably a modern, geometric font like 'Exo 2' or 'Rajdhani'

layout.structure: A vertically stacked, multi-section layout including a header, hero, content grids, and footer.

header-nav.name: main-navigation-bar
header-nav.description: The main site header with navigation links.

primary-button.name: cta-glow-button
primary-button.description: The main call-to-action button used across the site.

floating-icon.name: background-animated-mascot
floating-icon.description: Small, decorative icons that float and drift in the background.

info-card.name: status-check-card
info-card.description: Cards used to display status or key information points.

claim-form-section.name: main-content-area
claim-form-section.description: The main interactive section of the page, containing forms and info boxes.

form-input.name: text-input-field
form-input.description: A standard text input field for forms.

info-box.name: important-notes-container
info-box.description: A container for displaying important information, often next to a form.

warning-banner.name: notice-bar-warning
warning-banner.description: A small banner to display warnings or critical notices.

full-width-banner.name: cta-full-width-section
full-width-banner.description: A full-width banner used to draw attention to a specific action or message.

footer.name: main-site-footer
footer.description: The site footer containing logos, navigation, and social links.

social-icon.name: footer-social-link
social-icon.description: Circular icons for social media links with a glow effect on hover.
